synopsis.text:
Hikari Tsutsui, a high school senior and self-proclaimed '2D otaku,' finds his world turned upside down when he enters into a romantic relationship with the stunning Iroha Igarashi. As an obsessive fan of two-dimensional worlds, Hikari struggles to navigate the complexities of a three-dimensional relationship.

Despite his best efforts, Hikari's lack of experience in love often leads to misunderstandings and hurt feelings. Iroha, on the other hand, remains patient and committed to their relationship, even when Hikari's actions make her cry or become upset.

As the school cultural festival approaches, Hikari finds himself overwhelmed with responsibilities on the festival committee, while Iroha faces pressure from her classmates to enter the beauty contest. Meanwhile, Hikari's best friend Itou must come to terms with his own unrequited love for Ayado.

Through it all, Hikari and Iroha remain determined to grow as individuals and as a couple. However, their journey is far from easy, and they must confront numerous challenges that threaten to tear them apart. Will their love be strong enough to overcome the obstacles that lie ahead, or will they succumb to the pressures of the real world? Join Hikari and Iroha as they embark on a heartwarming and hilarious journey of self-discovery and young love in this must-watch anime of 2018.
